law.catch_line: Annual reports filed by licensees with commissioner.

text.section: If the licensee holds two (2) or more licenses or is affiliated with other licensees, a composite report may be filed.
All reports shall be filed in a form as may reasonably be required by the commissioner and shall be sworn to by a responsible officer of the licensee.
The information submitted by licensees under this section shall be held in confidence by the department and the commissioner.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 812, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 17, effective January 1, 2010. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 601, sec. 13, effective April 14, 1998.
